snippet: Some obese people have normal cholesterol, glucose levels and blood pressure, but a new study suggests obesity by itself increases the risk for heart disease, stroke, diabetes and death.
abstract: Some obese people have normal cholesterol, glucose levels and blood pressure, but a new study suggests obesity by itself increases the risk for heart disease, stroke, diabetes and death.

headline.main: Idea of Healthy Obesity Is Tested
headline.print_headline: Patterns: Idea of Healthy Obesity Is Tested
